Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_DOMINIC>
There aren't any clothes here that suit me. That's
a shame.

<NAME_MOB_DOMINIC>
I bought a cute outfit. I can't wait to show it off!
♪

<NAME_MOB_DOMINIC>
Ooh, jackpot! Look at this design, and this fabric
is to die for! ♪

<NAME_MOB_DOMINIC>
My friends are going to be so jealous when they
see what I bought here!

<NAME_MOB_DOMINIC>
It's not polite to interrupt people.

<NAME_MOB_DOMINIC>
Prices can get a little steep around here, but you
get what you pay for, right?

<NAME_MOB_DOMINIC>
I'm here for the clothes. Fashion's my passion!

<NAME_MOB_DOMINIC>
I'm here in town for the clothes shopping. I hope
they have something I like!

<NAME_MOB_DOMINIC>
My friends get all jealous when I show 'em what
I bought here. So I figured, "Why not buy some
more?"

<NAME_MOB_DOMINIC>
This town's just about the fashion capital of the
world now! Did you know that?
